text: DeVry University is a private university with campuses in the United States. Its main programs of study are business administration, computer engineering, electrical engineering, network communication management, and other technology related studies. The university operates on a trimester course schedule and, if taken full-time, a person can graduate with a bachelor's degree in three years or less. == Other websites == * * Devry University Unofficial Blog * Keller Graduate School of Management * Category:1930s establishments in Illinois Category:1931 establishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Illinois
title: DeVry University
